knimeNode.name: Segment Cropper
knimeNode.shortDescription: Crops segments, given by a labeling, of an image.

fullDescription.intro: Crops segments, given by a labeling, of an image. The pixels that are not defined by the according segment a filled either with the maximum or minimum pixel value.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: Select the image and labeling column (image column is optional).
How the image pixel will be organised in the memory. May have impact on the runtime of algorithms.
Fills the pixels that are not covered with a constant value, either the minimum or maximum pixel value.

tab.name: ROI Filter
tab.option: Segment whose label DON'T comply with the specified rules (wildcards * are allowed) will not be part of the result table.
If true, one can add the non-ROI labels as a list. Non-ROI labels are labels, which are filtered out using the ROI filter.

ports.inPort: Images and corresponding Labeling in same column
